sentences.english: Now Charlie knows that all BINGO Kids have to do chores.
sentences.chinese: 現在查理知道了，所有的賓果孩子們都要做家務。

sentences.english: The local cinema has been made into a bingo hall .
sentences.chinese: 當地的電影院已被改成賓果遊戲廳了。

sentences.english: It is now available at Bingo Runner.
sentences.chinese: 它現在是可利用的在賓果遊戲賽跑者。

sentences.english: House of Bingo Can you beat this ?
sentences.chinese: 賓果之家你能不能戰勝呢？

sentences.english: Will we play bingo on Sundays nights?
sentences.chinese: 週日晚上我們可以玩賓果遊戲嗎？
我們連賓果遊戲都不允許玩。

sentences.english: Need a template for bingo halls.
sentences.chinese: 賓果遊戲大廳需要一個模板。

sentences.english: There was a farmer with a goat, And Bingo was his name-o.
sentences.chinese: 這裏有一個農民帶着一隻山羊，賓果是他的名字。

sentences.english: Play bingo to determine who goes first.
I'll hazard a dollar on the bingo game.
sentences.chinese: 我在這局賓果遊戲上賭一美元。

sentences.english: The host looks after it carefully every day and Bingo helps to guard the house.
sentences.chinese: 它主人每天都悉心照顧它，而賓果也會每天幫忙看家。

sentences.english: An early form of bingo was first played in Italy in 1530.
sentences.chinese: 一五三0年，在義大利第一次有人玩早期版本的賓果。

sentences.english: Supporters also enjoyed a stand-up bingo and a hot-pot supper.
sentences.chinese: 球迷非常享受賓果遊戲和豐盛晚餐。

sentences.english: Play bingo to determine who goes next.
sentences.chinese: 玩賓果遊戲來決定誰去下一個。

definition: to tolerate is to nurture an evildoer (idiom); spare the rod and spoil the child
vocal accompaniment in some traditional Chinese operas/to speak in support of/to chime in
to listen with respectful attention/(a polite request to sb to speak)/we are all ears
to die/euphemism, lit. to return West or to the Western Paradise
to keep a seed stock/seed held back for planting
to try to answer a question (in a quiz, guessing game, riddle etc)/quiz game
alarm (e.g. burglar or fire alarm)/warning device

pinyin: ren2 sheng1 he2 chu4 bu4 xiang1 feng2

definition: fight a battle of words/cross verbal swords
